name: Smoking Simulator
description:
Have you ever wanted to relax and have a good smoke in an atmospheric village? Then you are exactly at the right place - take a drag on your cigarette and go ahead and explore our wonderful world. It doesn’t matter whether you are an esthete or an amateur, everyone will find a piece of happiness in the Smoking Simulator, only here you can smoke a lot without any negative consequences, or you can go explore the atmospheric village, looking at the works of art on the walls and nature, as your heart desires.

Key Features:
-You can smoke 24/7 without any penalties/negative consequences
-Relaxing soundtrack
-You can take a running jump into the snow from a hill without fear of crashing
-Atmosphere and humor
-Various references
-Beautiful next-gen graphics

All similarities with real people, countries, places, etc. are purely coincidental. The game takes place in a fictional country - Cigaretteland.

Enjoy!)
